price: E, com efeito, sabeis os que de vós cometeram agressão no sábado, então, dissemo-lhes: "Sede símios repelidos!"
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
